item.title: WILMA or how to accommodate passengers on an aeroplane
item.description: WILMA or how to accommodate passengers on an aeroplane # United Airlines plans to improve boarding efficiency by implementing a new process called “WILMA” (window-middle-aisle). This change is set to begin on October 26, with Group 4 passengers boarding first.

item.title: Random Berlin
item.description: Oh fuck! or why decision making is one of the crucial parts of (not only) pilots course https://www.aviation101.com/aqpgrassroots FAA https://www.faa.gov/sites/faa.gov/files/04_phak_ch2.pdf EASA https://www.easa.europa.eu/sites/default/files/dfu/HE4_Single-Pilot-Decision-Making-v1.pdf
